attributes.action: stop the bbc from stirring up hatred against gay people by debating if they should be executed
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The BBC think it's ok to discuss whether or not gay people should be executed.

I feel they have gone too far this time and as a gay man, I am absolutely appalled something would be discussed on a PUBLIC SERVICE website!

There is enough hatred towards gay, lesbian, bisexual and transgendered people in this country, we don't need the BBC creating a little more.

I think the BBC should stick to it's remit of being a public service broadcaster or be privatised. 

http://newsforums.bbc.co.uk/nol/thread.jspa?forumID=7347&sortBy=2&edition=1&ttl=20091216233852

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
